User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the EduQuiz platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity. Matches Firebase Auth UID.

role.description: Role of the user (admin, teacher, student).

avatarUrl.description: URL for the user's avatar image.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Problem entity.

options.description: Possible answer options for the question.

answer.description: The correct answer to the question.

difficulty.description: The difficulty level of the question.

grading.description: The grading method for descriptive questions.

definition.description: Stores public user profile information. The document ID is the same as the Firebase Auth UID.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user, matching their Firebase Auth UID.

definition.description: Stores all quiz problems. Accessible to all authenticated users for reading. Only writable by admin or teacher roles.

params.name: problemId
params.description: The unique identifier for the problem.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is simplified for this educational quiz app. All users are in a single 'users' collection, and all problems in a 'problems' collection. This makes querying for data straightforward.
